<DIV></DIV>>The outer most atmosphere of prehistoric Earth was a tranquil void filled to

<DIV></DIV>>and sapphire surface of the 3rd planet from the sun.

<DIV></DIV>>had joined it into the distortion. But was the only one that did not burn up 
<DIV></DIV>>into crispy atoms as it descended in the form of a great revolving fireball 
<DIV></DIV>>down towards the flat grasslands of ancient Africa. 
<DIV></DIV>>The local wildlife having the intelligence enough to run for their pitiful 
<DIV></DIV>>little lives as the alien metallic behemoth rocketed towards them.
